PTM.DESCRIPTION: target location, i.e., the 1st point of completion interval. 3D, [EAST,NORTH,Depth]

ObjM.DESCRIPTION: objective(cost) function, default is the length of well trajectory

Nodes_offset_list.DESCRIPTION: a list of ?x4 arraies. Each array is the nodes for one offset trajectory. [x,y,z, MD]

safeDist_offset_f_list.DESCRIPTION: a list of strings. Each string is a function expression to define the safe distance for the corresponding off well.

safeDist_new_f_list.DESCRIPTION: a list of strings. Each string is a function expression to define the safe distance for the new well.

opt_factor_list.DESCRIPTION: a list of scalars (float). Each scalar is the opt_factor for the corresponding off well.

SF_list.DESCRIPTION: a list of scalars (float). Each scalar is the safety factor for the corresponding off well.

MD_intervalM.DESCRIPTION: measured depth interval in output data of well trajectory

slot.DESCRIPTION: available slot numbers in one cluster

cst_WH.DESCRIPTION: cost of subsea wellhead equipment of different slots, corresponding with slot
